verses.verse: {A Song of Ascents} {The Guardian of God's People} d I lift up my eyes toward the mountains from where will my help come?
My help is from the Lord , maker of heaven and earth.
He will never let {So MT; LXX reads Do not let} your foot slip, nor {So LXX Syr Hieronymous DSS 11QPs a ; the Heb. lacks nor} will {So MT; LXX reads nor let} your guardian become drowsy.
Look! The one who is guarding Israel never sleeps and does not take naps.
The Lord is your guardian; the Lord is your shade at your right side.
The sun will not ravage you by day, nor the moon by night.
The Lord will guard you from all evil, preserving {Or guarding} your life.
The Lord will guard your goings and comings, {Cf. Deut 28:6} from this time on and forever.
